Definition: Alphanumeric identifier of the measurement build by merging the last 2 numbers of census year, the name of the plot and the numeric identifier of the tree
Tree status (see appendix 1 for code meaning)
Dbh measurement method (see appendix 1 for code meaning)
Height of the lowest large branch on the first direction (uphill side of the tree)
Height of the lowest large branch on the second direction (left of the first direction)
Height of the lowest large branch on the third direction (downhill side of the tree)
Height of the lowest large branch on the fourth direction (right of the first direction)

Height of the lowest large branch on the second direction (left of the first direction)
Height of the lowest large branch on the third direction (downhill side of the tree)
Height of the lowest large branch on the fourth direction (right of the first direction)
